SapListener
IdocSender
SapSender
SendersEndpointSAP
Implementation of sender that calls a SAP RFC-function. N.B. If no requestFieldIndex or requestFieldName is specified, input is converted from xml; If no replyFieldIndex or replyFieldName is specified, output is converted to xml.
See also
Github - SapSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.sap.SapSender
Syntax
Copy
<SapSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
timeout	number	10000
Timeout in ms of obtaining a connection/result.
maxConnections	number	10
The maximum number of concurrent connections
maxExecuteRetries	number	1 (for repeatable messages) else 0
The maximum number of times the execution is retried
proxyHost	text	-
Proxy host
proxyPort	number	80
Proxy port
proxyAuthAlias	text	-
Alias used to obtain credentials for
